104 class ICCPROFLIB_API CIccTag
105 {
106 public:
107  CIccTag();
108 
118  virtual CIccTag* NewCopy() const {return new CIccTag;}
119 
120  virtual ~CIccTag();
121 
128  virtual icTagTypeSignature GetType() const { return icMaxEnumType; }
129  virtual bool IsArrayType() { return false; }
130  virtual bool IsMBBType() { return false; }
131 
132  virtual const icChar *GetClassName() const { return "CIccTag"; }
133 
134  static CIccTag* Create(icTagTypeSignature sig);
135 
136  virtual IIccExtensionTag* GetExtension() {return NULL;}
137 
146  virtual bool IsSupported() { return true; }
147 
160  virtual bool Read(icUInt32Number size, CIccIO *pIO) { return false; }
161 
173  virtual bool Write(CIccIO *pIO) { return false; }
174 
182  virtual void Describe(std::string &sDescription) { sDescription.empty(); }
183 
193  virtual icValidateStatus Validate(icTagSignature sig, std::string &sReport, const CIccProfile* pProfile=NULL) const;
194 
195  //All tags start with a reserved value. Allocate a place to put it.
196  icUInt32Number m_nReserved;
197 };

219  virtual const icChar *GetClassName() const { return "CIccTagUnknown"; }
220 
221  virtual bool Read(icUInt32Number size, CIccIO *pIO);
222  virtual bool Write(CIccIO *pIO);
223 
224  virtual void Describe(std::string &sDescription);
225 
226 
227 protected:

332 class ICCPROFLIB_API CIccTagSignature : public CIccTag
333 {
334 public:
335  CIccTagSignature();
336  CIccTagSignature(const CIccTagSignature &ITS);
337  CIccTagSignature &operator=(const CIccTagSignature &SignatureTag);
338  virtual CIccTag* NewCopy() const {return new CIccTagSignature(*this);}
339  virtual ~CIccTagSignature();
340 
341  virtual icTagTypeSignature GetType() const { return icSigSignatureType; }
342  virtual const icChar *GetClassName() const { return "CIccTagSignature"; }
343 
344  virtual void Describe(std::string &sDescription);
345 
346  virtual bool Read(icUInt32Number size, CIccIO *pIO);
347  virtual bool Write(CIccIO *pIO);
348 
349  icUInt32Number GetValue() const { return m_nSig; }
350  void SetValue(icUInt32Number sig) { m_nSig = sig; }
351  icUInt32Number operator=(icUInt32Number sig) { SetValue(sig); return m_nSig; }
352  virtual icValidateStatus Validate(icTagSignature sig, std::string &sReport, const CIccProfile* pProfile=NULL) const;
353 
354 protected:
355  icUInt32Number m_nSig;
356 };

383  virtual ~CIccTagNamedColor2();
384

386  virtual const icChar *GetClassName() const { return "CIccTagNamedColor2"; }
387 
388  virtual bool UseLegacyPCS() const { return true; } //Treat Lab Encoding differently?
389

391 
392  virtual bool Read(icUInt32Number size, CIccIO *pIO);

395  const icChar *GetPrefix() const { return m_szPrefix; }

397 
398  const icChar *GetSufix() const { return m_szSufix; }

400 
401  icUInt32Number GetVendorFlags() const { return m_nVendorFlags; }
402  void SetVendorFlags(icUInt32Number nVendorFlags) {m_nVendorFlags = nVendorFlags;}
403 
404  //The following Find functions return the zero based index of the color
405  //or -1 to indicate that the color was not found.
406  icInt32Number FindColor(const icChar *szColor) const;
407  icInt32Number FindRootColor(const icChar *szRootColor) const;
408  icInt32Number FindDeviceColor(icFloatNumber *pDevColor) const;

410

413  //InitFindPCSColor must be called before FindPCSColor
414  icInt32Number FindCachedPCSColor(icFloatNumber *pPCS, icFloatNumber dMinDE=1000.0) const;
415 
417  void ResetPCSCache();
418 
419  bool GetColorName(std::string &sColorName, icInt32Number index) const;
420  SIccNamedColorEntry &operator[](icUInt32Number index) const {return *(SIccNamedColorEntry*)((icUInt8Number*)m_NamedColor + index * m_nColorEntrySize);}
421  SIccNamedColorEntry *GetEntry(icUInt32Number index) const {return (SIccNamedColorEntry*)((icUInt8Number*)m_NamedColor + index * m_nColorEntrySize);}
422 
423  icUInt32Number GetSize() const { return m_nSize; }
424  icUInt32Number GetDeviceCoords() const {return m_nDeviceCoords;}
425  void SetSize(icUInt32Number nSize, icInt32Number nDeviceCoords=-1);
426 
427  virtual void SetColorSpaces(icColorSpaceSignature csPCS, icColorSpaceSignature csDevice);
428  icColorSpaceSignature GetPCS() const {return m_csPCS;}
429  icColorSpaceSignature GetDeviceSpace() const {return m_csDevice;}
430 
431  icFloatNumber NegClip(icFloatNumber v) const;
432  icFloatNumber UnitClip(icFloatNumber v) const;
433 
434  void Lab2ToLab4(icFloatNumber *Dst, const icFloatNumber *Src) const;
435  void Lab4ToLab2(icFloatNumber *Dst, const icFloatNumber *Src) const;
436 
437  virtual icValidateStatus Validate(icTagSignature sig, std::string &sReport, const CIccProfile* pProfile=NULL) const;
438 
439 protected:
440  icChar m_szPrefix[32];
441  icChar m_szSufix[32];
442 
443  SIccNamedColorEntry *m_NamedColor;
444  SIccNamedLabEntry *m_NamedLab;
445  icUInt32Number m_nColorEntrySize;
446 
447  icUInt32Number m_nVendorFlags;
448  icUInt32Number m_nDeviceCoords;
449  icUInt32Number m_nSize;
450 
451  icColorSpaceSignature m_csPCS;
452  icColorSpaceSignature m_csDevice;
453 };

541 template <class T, icTagTypeSignature Tsig>
542 class ICCPROFLIB_API CIccTagFixedNum : public CIccTag
543 {
544 public:
545  CIccTagFixedNum(int nSize=1);
546  CIccTagFixedNum(const CIccTagFixedNum &ITFN);
547  CIccTagFixedNum &operator=(const CIccTagFixedNum &FixedNumTag);
548  virtual CIccTag* NewCopy() const { return new CIccTagFixedNum(*this); }
549  virtual ~CIccTagFixedNum();
550 
551  virtual bool IsArrayType() { return m_nSize > 1; }
552 
553  virtual icTagTypeSignature GetType() const { return Tsig; }
554  virtual const icChar *GetClassName() const;
555 
556  virtual void Describe(std::string &sDescription);
557 
558  virtual bool Read(icUInt32Number size, CIccIO *pIO);
559  virtual bool Write(CIccIO *pIO);
560 
561  T &operator[](icUInt32Number index) {return m_Num[index];}
562 
564  icUInt32Number GetSize() const { return m_nSize; }
565  void SetSize(icUInt32Number nSize, bool bZeroNew=true);
566 
567 protected:
568  T *m_Num;
569  icUInt32Number m_nSize;
570 };

811 class ICCPROFLIB_API CIccTagData : public CIccTag
812 {
813 public:
814  CIccTagData(int nSize=1);
815  CIccTagData(const CIccTagData &ITD);
816  CIccTagData &operator=(const CIccTagData &DataTag);
817  virtual CIccTag* NewCopy() const {return new CIccTagData(*this);}
818  virtual ~CIccTagData();
819 
820  virtual icTagTypeSignature GetType() const { return icSigDataType; }
821  virtual const icChar *GetClassName() const { return "CIccTagData"; }
822 
823  virtual bool IsArrayType() { return m_nSize > 1; }
824 
825  virtual void Describe(std::string &sDescription);
826 
827  virtual bool Read(icUInt32Number size, CIccIO *pIO);
828  virtual bool Write(CIccIO *pIO);
829 
830  icUInt32Number GetSize() const { return m_nSize; }
831  void SetSize(icUInt32Number nSize, bool bZeroNew=true);
832  icUInt8Number &operator[] (icUInt32Number index) { return m_pData[index]; }
833  icUInt8Number *GetData(icUInt32Number index) { return &m_pData[index];}
834 
835  void SetTypeAscii(bool bIsAscii=true) { m_nDataFlag = bIsAscii ? icAsciiData : icBinaryData; }
836  bool IsTypeAscii() { return m_nDataFlag == icAsciiData; }
837  virtual icValidateStatus Validate(icTagSignature sig, std::string &sReport, const CIccProfile* pProfile=NULL) const;
838 
839 protected:
840  icUInt32Number m_nDataFlag;
841  icUInt8Number *m_pData;
842  icUInt32Number m_nSize;
843 };

852 class ICCPROFLIB_API CIccTagDateTime : public CIccTag
853 {
854 public:
855  CIccTagDateTime();
